price: ߊ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߞߎߡߊ߫ ߛߌ߫ ߝߐ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߛߓߍߓߊ߯ ߘߐߓߍ߲߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߦߋ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
